sentences.english: Conclusion Gram positive organisms are major pathogens of bacteremia in critically ill patients.

sentences.english: Conclusion The predominant pathogenic fungi of onychomycosis was dermatophytes.
sentences.chinese: 结论甲真菌病的致病菌仍以皮肤癣菌为主。

sentences.english: Overusing antiviral drugs can help germs become resistant to them.

sentences.english: They have very high mortality rates. They are sort of the doomsday-scenario bugs.

sentences.english: Large quantity of pathogen of the autumn seedlings will increase the pathogen quantity in over-wintering seedlings.
